name: Build Master: Open Fire
description:
Could it be the second habitable planet? All waiting for you to explore!

As Earth is running out of resources, humans have turned their eyes to the vast space, where they believe a new home planet could be discovered!

To be the first to occupy a livable planet, countries around the world have launched their manned spacecraft into space.

Something has gone wrong with your spaceship and you are forced to land on an unknown planet.

Faced with a land full of unknowns, what you need first is to find your lost companions.

Logging, mining and gathering resources. You need to make every possible effort to build your base to gain a firm foothold on the land.

Hunting, fishing, and growing crops. Only with a sustainable food supply can your base expand.

Army building and tech research will make you strong enough to counter any enemies.

Keep building to create a kingdom of your own!
